archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.1.1: Computer and network services that support critical business applications and processes should be defined in documented service agreements (e.g. contracts or service level agreements) that meet operational, safety and security requirements.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
